name: Pirate Name Generator
description: Ahoy there, matey! Need a fearsome pirate name to strike terror into the hearts of yer enemies? Look no further! Our Pirate Name Generator will shiver yer timbers with a treasure trove of swashbucklin' monikers.
introduction: Ever dreamed of sailing the seven seas, plundering gold, and commanding a loyal crew? It all starts with the perfect pirate name! This generator crafts names worthy of the most legendary buccaneers. Get ready to unleash your inner pirate!
howToUse: Simply click the 'Generate' button and behold! A randomly generated pirate name, ripe for the takin'.
Don't like what you see? Click again! We've got enough pirate names to fill Davy Jones' locker.
Feeling creative? Mix and match prefixes and suffixes to create a truly unique and terrifying moniker.
Once you've found the perfect name, write it on yer flag, tattoo it on yer arm, and shout it from the crow's nest! Arrr!

faqs.question: Is this generator really free?
faqs.answer: Aye, matey! Free as the sea breeze and twice as refreshing! Plunder away!

faqs.question: Can I use these names for my pirate character in a game or story?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! Consider it a gift from the depths of the Caribbean. Use these names to bring your pirate characters to life!

faqs.question: Will these names make me a better pirate?
faqs.answer: While we can't guarantee you'll instantly grow a beard and learn to sword fight, a good pirate name is a crucial first step to legendary status. So, yes, probably!

faqs.question: Are the names generated completely random?
faqs.answer: Mostly! We use a carefully curated list of pirate-y prefixes and suffixes, combined with a touch of algorithmic magic, to create names that sound authentic and fearsome.

faqs.question: Can I suggest new prefixes or suffixes for the generator?
faqs.answer: Arrr, we're always lookin' for ways to improve the plunder! Send yer suggestions our way, and we'll consider addin' them to the treasure chest.

faqs.question: What if I don't like any of the generated names?
faqs.answer: Keep generatin', ye scurvy dog! With countless combinations, you're bound to find a name that tickles yer fancy. Or, if ye be truly desperate, try combin' two names ye like together!
